attributes.action: Legislate to ban MPs from standing for re-election if they have had to repay expenses totalling more then £500
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Once a member of parliament submits an expenses claim it should immediately become a legally binding document.

Any member who has, regardless of circumstances, repaid erroneous expenses claims totalling more than £500 should be banned from ever standing for re-election .

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
